paragraphs.title: Import Functions
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, max, min
from pyspark.sql.functions import count, sum,avg
from pyspark.sql.functions import desc
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, round
from datetime import datetime, timedelta as td
from pyspark.sql.functions import datediff,to_date,to_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.functions import countDistinct
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit
from pyspark.sql.functions import substring
from pyspark.sql.functions import broadcast
spark.version

paragraphs.title: Date Definition
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

today = (datetime.today() - td(days=0))

d0 = (today - td(days=1)).date()
d1 = (today - td(days=2)).date()
d6 = (today - td(days=6)).date()
d7 = (today - td(days=8)).date()
d14 = (today - td(days=15)).date()
d21 = (today - td(days=22)).date()
d28 = (today - td(days=29)).date()
d180 = (today - td(days=180)).date()

print d0,d1,d6,d7,d14,d21,d28,d180

paragraphs.title: Sales Calculations
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

################### Source Data ######################


lot_stk_move = spark.sql("select * from dub_gcity.zed_lot_stk_move")\
                        .fillna({'tsm_qty_pack':'0','tsm_qty_loose':'0','tsm_conv_lsstk':'1'})\
                        .withColumn("tsm_qty_total",col("tsm_qty_pack")+col("tsm_qty_loose")/col("tsm_conv_lsstk"))\
                        .withColumn("tsm_cre_date",to_date("tsm_cre_dt"))\
                        .filter(col("tsm_cre_date")>=d180)\
                        .filter(col("tsm_cre_date")<today.date())

lot_trn_head = spark.sql("select * from dub_gcity.zed_lot_trn_head").withColumn("trxh_cre_date",to_date("trxh_cre_dt")).filter(col("trxh_cre_date")>=d28)
broadcast(lot_trn_head)

lot_stk_move1 = lot_stk_move.join(lot_trn_head,col("tsm_doc_no")==col("trxh_doc_no"),"inner")
lot_stk_move1.cache()

Products = spark.sql("select prod_code as tsm_prod_code,prod_desc as Prod_Description,prod_div_code from dub_ho.zed_lom_mst_product")

Master = spark.sql("select camd_entity_code as prod_div_code,camd_entity_desc as Prod_Division from dub_ho.zed_lom_mst_carry_all_detl where camd_entity_group='DIVISION'")

################## Data Check #############################
if(lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_cre_dt")>=to_timestamp(lit((str(d0)+" 21:00:00")), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")).count()==0):
    print("No data present for yesterday")
    exit()
else:
    print("Data present for yesterday")
################## Product Classification #################

Product_Class = lot_stk_move.groupBy("tsm_prod_code")\
                .agg(min("tsm_cre_date").alias("Min_Date"),sum("tsm_lc_value").alias("Total_Sales"),countDistinct("tsm_cre_date").alias("Days_Sold"))\
                .withColumn("Total_Days",datediff(lit(today.date()),col("Min_Date")))\
                .withColumn("Days_Sold_Ratio",col("Days_Sold")/col("Total_Days"))\
                .withColumn("Cum_Sales",sum("Total_Sales").over(Window.partitionBy().orderBy(desc("Total_Sales"))))\
                .withColumn("Store_Sales",sum("Total_Sales").over(Window.partitionBy()))\
                .withColumn("Perc",col("Cum_Sales")/col("Store_Sales"))\
                .withColumn("A_B_C",when(col("Perc")<=0.80,"A").otherwise(when(col("Perc")<=0.95,"B").otherwise("C")))\
                .withColumn("F_M_S",when(col("Days_Sold_Ratio")>=0.75,"F").otherwise(when(col("Days_Sold_Ratio")>=0.25,"M").otherwise("S")))\
                .select("tsm_prod_code","A_B_C","F_M_S")

################## Sales Calculation #################

D1_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_cre_date")==d0).groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("D0_Sales"))
D2_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_cre_date")==d1).groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("D1_Sales"))
D8_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_cre_date")==d7).groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(sum("tsm_qty_total"),0).alias("D7_Sales"))
Avg_Sales = lot_stk_move1.filter(col("tsm_cre_date").isin([d7,d14,d21,d28])).groupBy("tsm_prod_code","tsm_cre_date").agg(sum("tsm_qty_total").alias("Tot_Sales"))\
                         .groupBy("tsm_prod_code").agg(round(avg("Tot_Sales"),0).alias("Avg_Sales"))

broadcast(D1_Sales)
broadcast(D2_Sales)
broadcast(D8_Sales)
broadcast(Product_Class)
broadcast(Products)
broadcast(Master)


Sales = Avg_Sales.join(D8_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                 .join(D2_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                 .join(D1_Sales,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                 .join(Product_Class,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                 .join(Products,"tsm_prod_code","leftouter")\
                 .join(Master,"prod_div_code","leftouter").fillna(0)\
                 .withColumn("Rule_1",when(col("D0_Sales") < 0.15*col("Avg_Sales"), 1).otherwise(0))\
                 .withColumn("Rule_2",when(col("D0_Sales") < 0.15*col("D7_Sales"), 1).otherwise(0))\
                 .withColumn("Rule_3",when(col("D0_Sales") < 0.15*col("D1_Sales"), 1).otherwise(0))\
                 .withColumn("Rules_Broken",col("Rule_1")+col("Rule_2")+col("Rule_3"))\
                 .withColumn("Sales_Alert",when(col("Rules_Broken")>=2,1).otherwise(0))\
                 .withColumn("Create_Date",lit(d0))\
                 .withColumnRenamed("tsm_prod_code","Prod_Code")

#Sales.printSchema()
#Sales.orderBy(desc("Avg_Sales")).show(50,False)
Sales.cache()
print Sales.count()

paragraphs.title: Alert Products
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

Alert = Sales.filter("(A_B_C='A' and F_M_S in ('F','M')) or (A_B_C='B' and F_M_S='F')")\
             .filter("Avg_Sales>10").filter("Sales_Alert==1")\
             .filter("Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%OFFER%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%@%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%OFF PRICE%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE                          '%+%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%SPECIAL PRICE%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%@SP %' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%PROMO%'                                         AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%DISCOUNT%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% OFF%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% OFF%'                                                AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% EXTRA%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\%EXTRA%'")\
             .orderBy("Prod_Division",desc("Avg_Sales"))

df = Alert.select("Prod_Code","Prod_Description","Prod_Division","D0_Sales","D1_Sales","D7_Sales","Avg_Sales")

df.show(100,truncate=False)

paragraphs.title: Email UDF
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

import csv
from tabulate import tabulate
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.mime.text import MIMEText
from email.mime.application import MIMEApplication
import smtplib

def email_alert_udf(me,password,you,cc,subject,text,html,df,d0):
	list =df.rdd.map(lambda row: [str(c) for c in row]).collect()
	data = [df.columns]+list
	text = text.format(table=tabulate(data, headers="firstrow", tablefmt="grid"))
	html = html.format(table=tabulate(data, headers="firstrow", tablefmt="html"))

	message = MIMEMultipart("alternative", None, [MIMEText(text),MIMEText(html,'html')])

	message['Subject'] = subject
	message['From'] = me
	message['To'] = ", ".join(you)
	message['Cc'] = ", ".join(cc)
	
	with open('/tmp/some-file.csv', 'wt') as fw:
	    writer = csv.writer(fw)
	    writer.writerows(data)
	
	part = MIMEApplication(open('/tmp/some-file.csv', 'r').read())
	part['Content-Disposition'] = 'attachment; filename=%s' % "Products List : "+str(d0.strftime('%d-%m-%Y'))+".csv"
	message.attach(part)
	
	server = 'smtp.office365.com:587'
	server = smtplib.SMTP(server)
	server.ehlo()
	server.starttls()
	server.login(me, password)
	server.sendmail(me, you+cc, message.as_string())
	server.quit()
	print("Email Sent Successfully")

paragraphs.title: Sales Alarm Email
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark me = 'rinaz.belhaj@zedeyelabs.com' password = 'grand@123' you = ['rahul.malani@zedeyelabs.com','sarvesh.rao@zedeyelabs.com'] cc = ['rinazbelhaj@gmail.com'] subject = "Sales Alarm for Non Performing SKUs - GCity" text = """ Hello Store Managers, Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance is not as per the expectation on """+str(d0.strftime('%A : %d-%b-%Y'))+""". Kindly have a look at it and respond with reasons behind poor performance. Note: D0_Sales - Yesterday's ["""+d0.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity D1_Sales - Day Before Yesterday's ["""+d1.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity D7_Sales - Last Week """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""'s Sales Quantity Avg_Sales - Average Sales Quantity of Last 4 """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""s {table} Regards, Zedeye Labs """ html = """

Hello Store Managers,

Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance on """+str(d0.strftime('%A : %d-%b-%Y'))+""" was not as per the expectation. Kindly have a look at it and respond with reasons behind poor performance.

Note:

D0_Sales - Yesterday's ["""+d0.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity
D1_Sales - Day Before Yesterday's ["""+d1.strftime('%A')+"""] Sales Quantity
D7_Sales - Last Week """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""'s Sales Quantity
Avg_Sales - Average Sales Quantity of Last 4 """+d7.strftime('%A')+"""s


{table}

Regards,
Zedeye Labs

""" Alert = Sales.filter("(A_B_C='A' and F_M_S in ('F','M')) or (A_B_C='B' and F_M_S='F')")\ .filter("Avg_Sales>10").filter("Sales_Alert==1")\ .filter("Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%OFFER%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%@%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%OFF PRICE%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%+%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%SPECIAL PRICE%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%@SP %' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%PROMO%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%DISCOUNT%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% OFF%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% OFF%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\% EXTRA%' AND Prod_Description NOT LIKE '%\%EXTRA%'")\ .orderBy("Prod_Division",desc("Avg_Sales")) df = Alert.select("Prod_Code","Prod_Description","Prod_Division","D0_Sales","D1_Sales","D7_Sales","Avg_Sales") if(df.count()>0): email_alert_udf(me,password,you,cc,subject,text,html,df,d0) out_path = "s3://zedeyelabs/Projects/Sales_Alarm/Dubai/Gcity/"+ str(d0)[0:4] +"/" + str(d0)[5:7]+"/"+str(d0)[8:10]+"/" Alert.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(out_path) print("Files Written to S3") else: print("No Mail Sent") #Sales.unpersist() #lot_stk_move1.unpersist() print("")

result.msg:
Email Sent Successfully
Files Written to S3

paragraphs.title: Escalation Mail to Higher Management
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark you = ['rahul.malani@zedeyelabs.com','sarvesh.rao@zedeyelabs.com'] cc = ['rinazbelhaj@gmail.com'] subject = "Escalation : Sales Alarm for Non Performing SKUs - GCity" text = """ Dear Anvar Sir, Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance was poor for last 6 days. Kindly discuss the same with the concerned store manager. Note: 6Day_Avg_Sales - Last 6 Days Average Sales Quantity Avg_Sales - Last 28 Days Average Sales Quantity {table} Regards, Zedeye Labs """ html = """

Dear Anvar Sir,

Please find the below list of fast moving and high value SKUs whose sales performance was poor for last 6 days. Kindly discuss the same with the concerned store manager.

Note:

6Day_Avg_Sales - Last 6 Days Average Sales Quantity
Avg_Sales - Last 28 Days Average Sales Quantity


{table}

Regards,
Zedeye Labs

""" in_path = "s3://zedeyelabs/Projects/Sales_Alarm/Dubai/Gcity/*/*/*/" Alarm_3 = spark.read.parquet(in_path).filter(col("Create_Date")>=d6)\ .groupBy("Prod_Code","Prod_Description","Prod_Division")\ .agg(sum("Sales_Alert").alias("Alarm"),avg("D0_Sales").alias("6Day_Avg_Sales"),avg("Avg_Sales").alias("Avg_Sales"))\ .filter("Alarm>=6").drop("Alarm")\ .orderBy("Prod_Division",desc("Avg_Sales")) Alarm_3.show(5) if(Alarm_3.count()>0): print("Escalated today") email_alert_udf(me,password,you,cc,subject,text,html,Alarm_3,d0) else: print("No Escalation today")
